list-item.label: a)
list-item.p: Environmental hygiene in medical sectors and personal hygiene of health care workers should be maintained [ 55, 56].

list-item.label: b)
list-item.p: Contact tracing, strict isolation of actively ill patients and quarantine of close contacts should be implemented early [ 54].

list-item.label: c)
list-item.p: Training in the use of personal protective equipment protects the safety of HCWs [ 57].

list-item.label: d)
list-item.p: Establishing fever clinics, setting up designated hospital wards and SARS hospitals reduced human-to-human transmission [ 58].

list-item.label: e)
list-item.p: Education of the public on communicable diseases and what measures to take on a personal basis to prevent spread.
